abstract: The Power Slider Case from Incase simultaneously protects and charges your iPhone 3G.
snippet: The Power Slider Case from Incase simultaneously protects and charges your iPhone 3G.
lead_paragraph: The iPhone 3G boasts its share of worthy features, but a durable battery life isn’t one of them, at least not if you consider yourself a power user. For an alternative to the midday charge, Incase has created the Power Slider Case for iPhone 3G.

headline.main: A Case for Filling the iPhone 3G’s Power Vacuum
headline.print_headline: A Case for Filling the iPhone 3G’s Power Vacuum
